fullText: One of the great things about the ZK industry is that innovation brings more interoperability, rather than fragmentation. @SuccinctLabs & @alignedlayer are great examples! https://t.co/oDCqMx82O5

name: Colosseum
fullText:
In about 30 min, Colosseum cofounders @mattytay, @crabbylions & @n8levine will be sharing insights on how hackathon teams should be structuring their time, what to include in their submissions, etc.

Join the livestream on Colosseum's platform at 12pm EDT
https://t.co/UzpU5wvHjL https://t.co/yWZqZhD1JH
